summary: Product ordering web application with member authentication and profile management
architectural_notes: Member authentication system required for profile access control

existing_features.title: Create a ProfilePage component at route /profile that displays the authenticated user's information including when they registered
Add a Profile navigation link in the Navigation component that is only visible to authenticated members
Automatically register users in the backend when they first authenticate with Internet Identity

new_feature_requests.summary: Add member-only profile page showing registered users
Create a backend function to store and retrieve user profile data including registration timestamp and user principal
